meanings.definition: A bird with a long, down-curved bill and a casque on the upper mandible.
meanings.sent1: The hornbills in the zoo have colorful feathers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of hornbills flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The hornbills decided to have a bill-length competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the call of hornbills.
meanings.sent5: The hornbills' distinctive bills make them easy to spot in the forest.

meanings.definition: Any of various large birds of the family Bucerotidae, native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia.
meanings.sent1: In the jungle, hornbills can be heard calling to each other.
meanings.sent2: The hornbills nested high up in the trees to protect their eggs.
meanings.sent3: The hornbills organized a talent show to showcase their unique calls.
meanings.sent4: The hornbills soared through the sky like majestic rulers of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant plumage of hornbills adds color to the lush greenery of the rainforest.
